txt1:
Your task: replace the refrigerant in an R404A system and determine the consequences. Challenge your knowledge and skill for the chance to win a prize!

txt7: To obtain the same function and temperatures, how will you change the setup and components?
title_1: You’ve switched from R404A to R448A. How will this affect the system?
